mapper.insert: insert into msg (writerno, receiverno, title, content) values (#{writerno},#{receiverno},#{title},#{content})
mapper.select: select msgno, writerno, receiverno, title, content, senddate from msg where msgno = #{msgno}
select msgno, writerno, receiverno, title, content, senddate from msg where writerno = #{userno}
select msgno, writerno, receiverno, title, content, senddate from msg where receiverno = #{userno}
